Step-by-step guide to renting equipment, listing gear, or finding the perfect wedding photographer in Bangladesh

Pay safely through our integrated payment system with escrow protection.

â±ï¸ 3-5 minutes
  • âœ“Choose your payment method (card, bKash, bank transfer)
  • âœ“Your payment is held in escrow until rental completion
  • âœ“Receive booking confirmation with pickup/delivery details
  • âœ“Get the owner's contact information for coordination

â±ï¸ 15-30 minutes

Return & Review

Return the equipment and leave honest feedback.

â±ï¸ 10-15 minutes
  • âœ“Clean and pack equipment in original condition

â“ Frequently Asked Questions

How long does verification take?

Usually 24-48 hours for basic verification. Professional photographer verification may take up to 3 business days.

What if equipment gets damaged?

Our insurance covers accidental damage. The deductible depends on your chosen coverage (basic or premium).

Can I cancel a booking?

Yes, with our flexible cancellation policy. Full refund if cancelled 48+ hours before rental start.

What payment methods are accepted?

Credit/debit cards, bKash, Nagad, and bank transfers are all supported.

How do I become a top photographer?

Maintain high ratings (4.5+), complete verification, and receive consistent positive reviews.

Is there a service fee?

Yes, we charge an 8% service fee to maintain the platform and provide customer support.

Ready to Get Started?
